name: Interactive Contradiction
description: This art work is one of the works in a four-part collection entitled "Interactive Contradiction" in which all four works are executed with a 3D technique.The base of this art work is formed from the statue of David by Michelangelo (as a masterpiece of art) with a 3D performance, on the mouth of which an object in the form of a mask is created, reminiscent of today's superheroes.The contradiction in this art work is a postmodern contradiction.Geometric shapes used in interaction with the statue, colors used, use of masks in the concept of superheroes and masks to prevent corona virus, use of old statues with modern performances, all to the postmodern work and contrasting interaction of objects Emphasizes.
